extension_name.message: danmakustr - YouTube Floating Comments (danmaku / danmu / 弹幕)

extension_description.message: A decentralized floating comment extension for YouTube. Comments are stored on servers you specify, not on a central server.

danmaku_input_placeholder.message: Send a danmaku comment to share how you're feeling right now
danmaku_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the danmaku input field
